botMessage: Hi, I'm Lian. I saw you in our hobbies group. You seem really cool! Can we get to know each other better?

options.text: Sure! Here's my number, you can text me.
That's nice of you, but I don't share personal info with people I don't know well.
I'd love to, but I need to check with my parents first.

botMessage: Of course, it's important to get your parents' permission. I'll respect that, but in the meantime, I'd love to talk about our hobbies in the group.

options.text: Yes, that's a great idea. Let's talk about our hobbies.
I'll update you after I check with my parents.
We'd better wait until I get permission.

botMessage: Awesome! I love reading books and drawing. What hobbies do you have?

options.text: I love drawing too! What do you like to draw most?
I enjoy reading books but prefer to talk about general topics.
That's nice, but I'm not sure I want to continue talking.
